name: Ch.5XBaseConvo1
_source: speak;Ephraim;Well Kyle, with supplies this low, we are gonna have to make this next battle count.
speak;Kyle;Agreed Prince Ephraim.|I hope we can scrape by.
speak;Anna;I'm Anna, a traveling merchant!|I'm here to make a deal with you.
speak;Kyle;A merchant, huh?|Prince Ephraim, this may be a good chance to resupply!
speak;Ephraim;You're right Kyle, this is a lucky break for us.|What wares do you have available?|We are in need of food and weapons.
speak;Anna;He he he, perfect!|I'm glad my sister's information was correct!|Now I can finally start making a profit!
speak;Ephraim;Kyle, I will let you handle selecting out the food.
speak;Anna;I also have someone for you to meet that might help you!
speak;Anna;Oh yes!|Ok you two!|Come on out!
speak;HorseyBoy;Indeed, though we don't think we were always this way.
speak;HorseyBoy;Indeed I did, though my sister here cannot speak.|So please don't consider her rude.
speak;HorseyBoy;I believe we aren't related by blood.|You see, we were experiments of some dark robed men.|Fortunately a dark robed man set us free.
speak;HorseyBoy;For what, I don't know.|My mind is all scrambled.|So there isn't much I can tell you...
speak;HorseyBoy;What I do know is that we have a friend in Renvall that we want to rescue.|Anna told us you were going there.|We want to join you.
speak;Ephraim;A friend...|I see...|If Anna trusted you, it should be ok...|But...
speak;Ephraim;All right, you two are in.|Keep a low profile though.|It's harder to lead a larger group for this operation.
speak;HorseyBoy;Well...|We don't have names yet...|If you need names, feel free to call us whatever you like.
speak;Ephraim;In that case, your names will be...
speak;Ephraim;Our operation needs a low body count.|I'm sorry, but I don't think I can win with you alongside us.
speak;HorseyBoy;I see...|While it saddens me to hear that, I understand.|We will see if we can find our friend another way...
